LanguageData.NodWall_TBNW.label: Nod wall
LanguageData.NodWall_TBNW.description: An impassable wall especially designed for the Brotherhood.

LanguageData.NodWall_TBNW_Frame.label: Nod wall (building)
LanguageData.Nod_LaserFence.label: Laser fence
LanguageData.Nod_LaserFence.description: Use this to protect yourself from enemies!
LanguageData.Nod_LaserFence_Blueprint.label: Laser fence (blueprint)
LanguageData.Nod_LaserFence_Frame.label: Laser fence (building)
LanguageData.Nod_Door_TBNW.label: Nod door
LanguageData.Nod_Door_TBNW.description: Divides rooms. Must be manually opened and closed, which slows people down.
LanguageData.Nod_Door_TBNW_Blueprint.label: Nod door (blueprint)
LanguageData.Nod_Door_TBNW_Frame.label: Nod door (building)
LanguageData.Nod_Autodoor_TBNW.label: Nod autodoor
LanguageData.Nod_Autodoor_TBNW.description: Divides rooms. Powered operation allows people to move through the door without slowing down.
LanguageData.Nod_Autodoor_TBNW_Blueprint.label: Nod autodoor (blueprint)
LanguageData.Nod_Autodoor_TBNW_Frame.label: Nod autodoor (building)
LanguageData.Nod_Laserdoor.label: Nod Lserdoor
LanguageData.Nod_Laserdoor.description: Divides rooms. Powered operation allows people to move through the door without slowing down.

LanguageData.Nod_Laserdoor_Frame.label: Nod Lserdoor (building)

LanguageData.Bullet_ObeliskGun.label: obelisk laser bullet
LanguageData.NodSecurity_ShredderTurret.label: Shredder turret
LanguageData.NodSecurity_ShredderTurret.description: A Nod shredder turret, useful to control masses.
LanguageData.NodSecurity_ShredderTurret_Frame.label: Shredder turret (building)
LanguageData.Gun_ShredderTurret.label: shredder turret gun
LanguageData.Bullet_Shredder.label: pew pew
LanguageData.Nod_TiberiumSuppressor.label: Tiberium-Growth Suppressor
LanguageData.Nod_TiberiumSuppressor.description: This specialized facility connects to a nearby Brotherhood of Nod Wall or Laser Fence (needs to be touching) and spreads a suppressing liquid through those. This way Tiberium will be suppressed from further growth near the walls. Requires a huge amount of electricity.
LanguageData.Nod_TiberiumSuppressor_Blueprint.label: Tiberium-Growth Suppressor (blueprint)
LanguageData.Nod_TiberiumSuppressor_Frame.label: Tiberium-Growth Suppressor (building)
